channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Cookie Notice & Consent Banner for GDPR & CCPA Compliance

item.title: CVE-2021-24590|2024-08-03T19:35:20.251Z -- unknown -- cookie%20notice%20%26%20consent%20banner%20for%C2%A0gdpr%20%26%20ccpa%20compliance
item.description: The Cookie Notice & Consent Banner for GDPR & CCPA Compliance WordPress plugin before 1.7.2 does not properly sanitize inputs to prevent injection of arbitrary HTML within the plugin's design customization options.
